#summary Here's a quick list of known issues.

  * in mozilla projects, the translator credits are not exported; please edit them manually for now
  * in gettext projects, access keys are not always recognized; however this should not affect the functionality
  * sometimes you get a 0 bytes archive after project export; scheduled to be fixed in beta 2
  * openoffice .sdf import is broken; scheduled to be fixed in beta 2
  * for gettext there you cannot have a different number of plurals than the template has  

These issues are known and will be fixed. If you find other issues, please [http://code.google.com/p/narro/issues/entry report them].
